title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants       WHERE TO EAT Food is not available in the park. Visitors may pack a lunch and enjoy the picnic area. Drinking fountains are available near the visitor center or bottled water may be purchased at the bookstore. The nearest restaurants and convenience stores are located along Highway 11 on the way to Kailua-Kona.
